description: Unset subports from a given network trunk
name: network.trunk.unset

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

subport.description: Subport to delete (name or ID of the port) (--subport) option can be repeated

trunk.description: Unset subports from this trunk (name or ID)
